description: This source file contains implementation of conversion functions for converting a 32-bit unsigned integer (SLAP_UINT32) to a SLAP_UCHAR_ARRAY, including functions to convert to an array of variable length and to a single-element array, as part of the SLAP Var Converter Object within the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP).

methods.name: SLAP_UCHAR_ARRAY * SlapVcoUint32ToUcharArray(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,SLAP_UINT32 var_uint32)
methods.description: Converts a SLAP_UINT32 to a SLAP_UCHAR_ARRAY with variable length based on size of ULONG.

methods.name: SLAP_UCHAR_ARRAY * SlapVcoUint32ToUchar(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,SLAP_UINT32 var_uint32)
methods.description: Converts a SLAP_UINT32 to a single-element SLAP_UCHAR_ARRAY containing the least significant byte.
